akn:section.akn:heading: Effective dates of reductions and discontinuances

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Except as otherwise specified in this section, the effective date of reduction or discontinuance of compensation, dependency and indemnity compensation, or pension shall be fixed in accordance with the facts found.
